Documentation

Get started with GlusterFS

Scalable

GlusterFS scales up to 72 brontobytes. We won't say it should be enough, but it should do for a while. It also serves thousands of clients without a hitch.

How big is your need? »

Affordable

Use commodity hardware off the shelf. GlusterFS runs on 64-bit x86 Linux,

Compatible

Supports standard clients running standard applications over any standard IP network - using common off-the-shelf hardware.
